attributes.action: Stop telecom companies over charging for broadband services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Absolute disgrace the cost of broadband service to a school, this can cost for a typical 500 hundred pupil primary school about £4800 a year.
ISP@£2.85 Charges per pupil should this not be per computer?
Its time the government looked at the cost for high technology in schools can they afford it?
How much should companies be charging to make a profit?
Tax payers money being exploited one again!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
